package.name: MagSafe充电动画-Rootless
package.shortDescription: 将设备连接到电源时，在锁定屏幕上启用原生MagSafe充电动画。Enable new native MagSafe charging view on lockscreen when connecting device to power source

descriptionlist.description: 将设备连接到电源时，在锁定屏幕上启用原生MagSafe充电动画。Enable new native MagSafe charging view on lockscreen when connecting device to power source
